Privacy Policy
Takalam L.T.D. (“Takalam”), a limited liability company established in the United Arab Emirates, owns and maintains (a) www.TakalamHere.com, a wellness counselling website, as well as a mobile application (the “App”), and collectively (the "Platform").
Takalam is dedicated to maintaining privacy protections that provide users with confidence and clarity whenever using the Platform. Respecting users' privacy is one of the most important pillars of Takalam’s operations. No other cou...

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects Personal Data, Sensitive Personal Data (including health data), and AI Inputs and AI Outputs.

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the information provided in the privacy policy document about the types of data collected by the app, including Personal Data, Sensitive Personal Data, and AI Inputs and AI Outputs.
reply.reference: Personal Data or personal information means any information about an individual from which that person can be identified. We may collect, use, store, and transfer different kinds of Personal Data about you, which includes but is not limited to:...; We will only process your Sensitive Personal Data, including health data, in accordance with the applicable laws and regulations...; If you use features within the Services that incorporate artificial intelligence (AI) or machine learning, we may collect and process the information you provide to those features (such as prompts, messages, or uploaded content) ('AI Inputs'). We may also process the content generated by those features ('AI Outputs'), particularly where it is saved, shared, or used within your account... URL: https://takalamhere.com/en/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt-out of data collection by contacting the app, as stated in the privacy policy. The app provides options to stop receiving marketing messages and offers ways to choose not to have data used for advertisements.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly mentions that users can opt-out of data collection or marketing communications by contacting the app directly through various means provided.
reply.reference: If you do not wish to have your Personal Data used by us to promote our own or third parties’ products or services, you can opt-out by contacting us. You can ask us or third parties to stop sending you marketing messages at any time by following the opt-out links on any marketing message sent to you or by contacting us at any time by sending us an email. URL: https://takalamhere.com/en/privacy-policy

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: Personal Data may be transferred, stored, processed, and used by affiliated companies and/or non-affiliated service providers in one or more countries outside the user's country. Takalam ensures protection of Personal Data by requiring all group companies to follow the same rules.

extended_simple_answer.content: affiliated companies and/or non-affiliated service providers

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that Personal Data may be shared with affiliated companies and service providers outside the user's country. Takalam ensures protection by imposing rules on all group companies.
reply.reference: Personal Data that we collect from you is stored in the UAE...Your Personal Data may be transferred, stored, processed, and used by our affiliated companies and/or non-affiliated service providers in one or more countries outside your country. We ensure your Personal Data is protected in these cases by requiring all our group companies to follow the same rules when processing your Personal Data. URL: https://takalamhere.com/en/privacy-policy
